p: To separate cells and aggregates from the cyst fluid, all samples were centrifuged twice at 2,500 rpm for 10 min at room temperature (RT). Measurement of total protein concentration was performed by using a spectrophotometer ND-1000 (NanoDrop Technologies, USA). Protein concentrations are given in S3 Table together with information about viscosity and appearance of cyst fluids determined by visual inspection.
